author: geuerp
msg: The KeyWrap code now uses plain algorithms. This means that
it only needs a AES/EBC/NOPADDING or a TRIPLEDES/CBC/NOPADDING.
This solution does not use the _very_ nice AESWrap and DESEDEWrap
ciphers which are available in the BouncyCastle provider.
This approach has the advantage that the requirements for the JCE
are lower because we implement the complicated wrap algorithms
